title: King Soopers Font?
content:
I managed to find the font for KING in the image but still haven't figured out what font the SOOPERS is using.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821201140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/king_soopers_6092.png)
author: whoisshaun

comments.content: Awesome! Thank you for the quick reply.
